name: Hide/ Customize MindMeister toolbar (in WorkFlowy)
description:
- This style hides (or alternatively customizes) the blue MindMeister toolbars, which you might want to do when embedding into WorkFlowy. 
- See this WorkFlowy blog post: https://blog.workflowy.com/2016/06/09/iframe-in-workflowy/
